title: The GREATEST Filler Arc Ever?! (G8 Anime Arc, Episodes 196-206)
author: The One Piece Virgin
description: Podcast episode covering the G-8 Arc (Episodes 196-206) featuring Animak from AnimeUproar, Tekking101, Briggs from All Day Anime, and Nux Taku. Discusses why the G-8 arc is considered one of the best filler arcs in anime.

title: The GREATEST Filler Arc Ever?! (G8 Anime Arc, Episodes 196-206)
author: The One Piece Virgin
description: Apple Podcasts version of the G-8 Arc discussion covering episodes 196-206, featuring multiple One Piece content creators.

title: Episode 71 - Episodes 196-206 Rewatch: The G-8 Filler Arc Review
author: Sunny Go One Piece Podcast
description: Podcast episode diving into the G-8 filler arc where the Strawhats find themselves in the middle of a Marine Fortress and must figure out a way to avoid detection and escape while hijinks ensue.

title: One Piece: This Filler Arc Had the Funniest Joke in the Entire Show
author: Game Rant
description: Article discussing the Condoriano joke from the G-8 Arc and why it's considered one of the funniest moments in One Piece. Explains how Usopp's lies create the iconic 'Con D. Oriano' meme.

title: Most Anime Wish Their Filler Was As Good As One Piece's
author: CBR
description: Article praising the G-8 Arc as exceptional filler content, noting that 'The Arc manages to blend humor and clever action tactics without slowing down the pace' and that 'The characters are all on point, and the story fits naturally with the anime's adventurous tone.'

title: Netflix's 'ONE PIECE' Should Include the G-8 Filler Arc
author: Murphy's Multiverse
description: Article arguing that the G-8 Arc should be included in Netflix's live-action One Piece adaptation due to its quality storytelling, character development, and natural fit within the narrative.

title: One Piece: G-8 Arc (Filler) | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers
description: Comprehensive summary, recap, and review of the G-8 Arc, discussing its place in the One Piece storyline and why it's beloved by fans despite being filler.

title: One Piece Diaries #25: G-8 Arc
author: COMICON
description: Part of the One Piece Diaries series, this article provides a detailed look at the G-8 Arc from a first-time viewer's perspective.

title: Blackjack Rants: One Piece Filler Arcs, Part 2 -- G-8, Dreams and Foxy
author: Blackjack Rants
description: Blog post analyzing One Piece filler arcs with a focus on the G-8 Arc and comparing it to other filler content in the series.

title: One Piece â€“ G-8 Arc Recap
author: TV Tropes
description: TV Tropes recap page for the G-8 Arc, documenting tropes, character moments, and notable story beats from episodes 196-206.

title: One Piece Episode 206 - IMDb
author: IMDb
description: IMDb page for Episode 206 'Saraba Kaigun Yousai! Dasshutsu e no Saigo no Koubou' with a rating of 7.5/10 based on user reviews. Includes cast information and episode details.

title: One Piece: Who is Condoriano from the G-8 Arc?
author: ComingSoon
description: Explainer article about the Condoriano meme, detailing how Usopp's lie about Shepherd being 'Condoriano' became one of the most enduring One Piece inside jokes and why fans jokingly refer to him as 'Con D. Oriano.'
